channel.title: Login names

item.title: Login names
item.dc:creator: @gether gether
item.description:
@gether wrote:

ok so my code works except for when i log in it shows both co owner and the one and only coder… anyway 2 fix??

EDIT:i tryed else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“gethero”)) {
yell("@dbl@The One And Only Owner & Coder-"+playerName+" has logged in!@mag@");
and i got this error

client.java:10347: 'else' without 'if'
else if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("gethero")) {
^
1 error
Finished!
Press any key to continue . . .

public void initialize() { switch(playerRights) { case 3: yell("@dbl@Co Owner-" +playerName+ " has logged in!@red@"); } if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("gethero")) { yell("@dbl@The One And Only Owner & Coder-"+playerName+" has logged in!@mag@"); } switch(playerRights) { case 2: yell("@lre@Adiministrator-"+playerName+" has logged in!@lre@"); } switch(playerRights) { case 1: yell("@whi@Moderator-"+playerName+" has logged in!@whi@"); } switch(playerRights) { case 4: yell("@mag@GOD OF PKING!-"+playerName+" has logged in!@mag@"); }

Read full topic
